const today=new Date().toISOString().split('T')[0];const tomorrow=new Date(new Date().setDate(new Date().getDate()+1)).toISOString().split('T')[0];const yesterday=new Date(new Date().setDate(new Date().getDate()-1)).toISOString().split('T')[0];const transformedData=data.map(event=>{let newDate=event.date;// Replace static dates with relative dates for demo
